entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
